acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs with generified collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojoWithGenerifiedCollectionsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithGenericCollectionsPojo

Then the Object <span class='step-parameter'>ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo ( nonGenerifiedCollection = [OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 69 byteObjectField = 1 shortField = 99 shortObjectField = 66 charField = N charObjectField = T intField = 410557402 intObjectField = 1129707958 longField = 835283165055677 longObjectField = 835283163838956 floatField = 0.71013784 floatObjectField = 0.6540406 doubleField = 0.3174320547481868 doubleObjectField = 0.0013716886003228845 stringField = biGQlLR3_I objectField = java.lang.Object@794f2bdf calendarField = Sun Jun 07 20:51:01 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 07 20:51:01 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@d2ce743 intArray = [I@2d21fa63 booleanArray = [Z@c370bb5 bigDecimalField = 459613756538 ) should not be null

Then the collection should have exactly OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 24 byteObjectField = 97 shortField = 121 shortObjectField = 12 charField = s charObjectField = W intField = -1993024559 intObjectField = -763632257 longField = 835283166037764 longObjectField = 835283165996361 floatField = 0.20060533 floatObjectField = 0.4517418 doubleField = 0.7417273876263061 doubleObjectField = 0.5679071564795215 stringField = eV2dE_PQsL objectField = java.lang.Object@794f2bdf calendarField = Sun Jun 07 20:51:01 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 07 20:51:01 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@c26c83f intArray = [I@66da2007 booleanArray = [Z@448a2c5d bigDecimalField = 459613756538 ) elements

Then the collection should not be null or empty
